data.name: RAMS Saver
data.description: A completely online savings account, easily managed via myRAMS where you can deposit, withdraw and transfer funds

features.additionalInfo: Monitor and manage securely online with myRAMS

eligibility.additionalValue: An individual who does  not hold the account as a trustee of a trust or a superannuation fund, or on behalf of a deceased estate or pursuant to a power of attorney or guardianship order (maximum of two account holders allowed)
An Australian resident for taxation purposes with an Australian residential address
Email address and mobile phone number
eligibility.additionalInfo: Must have valid email address and Australian mobile phone number

fees.name: Monthly service fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is currently no account keeping fee or account monthly service fee on any RAMS deposit account.

fees.name: Online Banking withdrawal (including Mobile Banking)
fees.additionalInfo: When you make an EFT purchase or cash withdrawal in Australia

fees.name: Telephone Banking withdrawal (self service)
fees.additionalInfo: Not applicable

fees.name: Telephone Banking withdrawal (staff assisted)
fees.additionalInfo: Service not listed

fees.name: Branch staff assisted withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Service not listed

fees.name: ATM withdrawals or balance enquiries
fees.additionalInfo: While RAMS does not charge transaction fees, some institutions may charge a fee for use of their ATMs.

fees.name: Card Issue fee for new card
fees.additionalInfo: When you are issued with your first debit card

fees.name: Card Issue fee renewed card
fees.additionalInfo: When your debit card is renewed

fees.name: Card issue fee for lost or stolen card
fees.additionalInfo: When your debit card is lost / stolen and re-issued

fees.name: Card issue fee for replacement card
fees.additionalInfo: When you request your debit card is to be replaced e.g. damaged card

fees.name: Cheque Deposit fees
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever you send us a cheque for deposit into your account

fees.name: Special Answer
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a special answer on a cheque deposited with RAMS

fees.name: Bank Cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a bank cheque

fees.name: Bank Cheque replacement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request RAMS to repurchase an already issued bank cheque

fees.name: Bank Cheque repurchase fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a replacement bank cheque

fees.name: Australia Post Cash and Cheque Deposit fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for cash & cheque deposits at Australia Post

fees.name: Australia Post Cash Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you withdraw cash at Australia Post branches

fees.name: Duplicate Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a duplicate or an interim statement

fees.name: Eftpos Cash Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: When you make an EFT cash withdrawal in Australia

fees.name: Eftpos purchase or cash out
fees.additionalInfo: When you make an EFT purchase or cash withdrawal in Australia

fees.name: Overdrawn account fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each transaction that overdraws (or further overdraws) your account, draws on uncleared funds or exceeds the available funds in the account at the time of transaction.

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a payment to RAMS under your Direct Debit Request is dishonoured or when we dishonour a direct debit presented on your account

fees.name: Dishonour fees for a cheque deposited to your account
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a cheque payment to us is dishonoured. This is when a cheque you deposit is dishonoured by the issuing bank.

fees.name: Australia Post Cheque dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a cheque you deposit at any branch of Australia Post is dishonoured.

fees.name: Trace Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request further information on a transaction on your account.

depositRates.additionalValue: No interest paid for the month if account balance over $5 million
Bonus interest is payable each month that you make a minimum deposit of $200, make no withdrawals and the account balance is up to $500,000
depositRates.additionalInfo: Bonus interest is not payable for the month if account balance is over $500,000

depositRates.additionalValue: Interest is paid each month at base rate if account balance is between $0.01 and $5,000,000
